text.name: system_description
text.text: Is an 8-bit handheld game console which was developed and manufactured by Nintendo. It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line and was created and published by team led by Gunpei Yokoi at the time.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Game Boy es una serie de videoconsolas portátiles alimentadas con pilas (a excepción del modelo SP y Micro) y comercializadas por Nintendo. Es oficialmente la tercera consola más vendida del mundo.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Elle fut conçue par Gunpei Yokoi et Nintendo Research and Development 1 — la même équipe ayant conçu la série des Game and Watch ainsi que de nombreux jeux à succès sur Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: system_description
text.text: O Game Boy é o segundo portátil da Nintendo, criado após a linha Game and Watch lançada em 1980. Junto ao Game Boy Color, venderam impressionantes 118,69 milhões de unidades.
